ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill out the following fields before closing the case: Person_In_Charge__c,Menu_Typed_Date__c,Person_in_Charge_Final_Check__c,Final_Check_Date__c,Person_In_Charge_Take_Online__c,Take_Online_Date__c
